name: Hot Tweeters
description: Allows Twitter users to Ranks Each Other
overview:
Hot Tweeters provides a way to vote for the hottest people on Twitter. However, there are no down votes allowed. It’s basically, “hot or no comment.”

You simply open up the application (at hottweeters.com) and agree to the terms – just a standard Twitter-type agreement. Then you can start selecting the attractive members from our pool of Twitter users. Pick up to three per screen and move on to the next set of avatars awaiting your judgment. If you are signed in with your Twitter account, you can view each user’s full sized Twitter photo through our lightbox. The application will also keep track of the people you’ve listed as hotties.
